name: Bikash Subedi
introduction:
'This is Bikash Subedi's website, and this is a bit of copy about him, It's not enough intro about him.'

Bikash is in IT Faculty, He has a lots of knowledge about Digital World, Content & Contents Rules, Cyber Security, Programming, Cisco, Web, (AND MORE): Active in Podcasts, Videos, Ebooks, Webinars: That Engage Customers and Ignite Your Business (Professional With Champion)

His company, BikkizTweau, is a IT training and education company with more than 600,000 subscribers.

BikkizTweau trains worldwide through its online and in-person education programs.

Her previous company, ClickZ, is one of the first sources of information in the world. He left it in 2018, a lifetime ago in Internet years.

Bikash was cited as a top thought leader.

Bikash is the world’s first Chief Content Officer and an acclaimed writer and communicator.

Bikash lives in Chitwan, where he stay with family and have beautiful girlfriend.
